Name: JON HALLETT
Excerpt: Jon Hallett is the Executive Chairman of BetterCloud. Jon’s investment firm, Hallett Capital, led BetterCloud's first round of company funding.

Name: DAVID POLITIS
Excerpt: David Politis is the founder and CEO of BetterCloud. He oversees the day-to-day activities of the company and the overall product vision and business strategy.

Name: DAVID ARONOFF
Excerpt: David Aronoff is a General Partner at Flybridge Capital Partners and currently manages the firm’s New York City office.

Name: ENRIQUE SALEM
Excerpt: Enrique joined Bain Capital Ventures in 2014, where he focuses on infrastructure software and services. Previously, he was CEO of Symantec (Nasdaq: SYMC).

Name: ARUN MATHEW
Excerpt: Arun Mathew joined Accel in 2009 and leads growth investments in the enterprise, security, and infrastructure markets.

Name: BRIAN CHANG
Excerpt: Brian Chang is Managing Director at Warburg Pincus and focuses on investments in the technology, software, and financial technology sectors.
